# nel-tip

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                             | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `expires` | `expires` | Hides the visible tip after n milliseconds. 0 (disabled) is default     | `number`  | `0`     |
| `for`     | `for`     | If true, element is visible                                             | `string`  | `""`    |
| `ready`   | `ready`   | True when element can correctly respond to external programmatic access | `boolean` | `false` |
| `show`    | `show`    | If true, element is visible                                             | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                                                              | Type               |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `changed` | Fired after element is activated                                         | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `loaded`  | Fired when element can correctly respond to external programmatic access | `CustomEvent<any>` |
